title: Killing Floor 2 V1006 + Launcher + DLC Extras + SDK - Royalgame
description:
___________
INTRODUCTION
This package includes everything for Killing Floor 2.
Up-to-date as of today (27-04-2015).
What you don't want it up for you to decide.
I've put everything in separated archives, so you can choose what to download from the torrent.
I'll explain what everything is. Then the instructions for everything.

_______
CONTENT
Killing.Floor.2.V1005.Cracked-Royalgamer06
This is the full game v1005. It's the pre-early access version, the beta.
It includes my V5, which is outdated. 

Killing.Floor.2.Update.V1005.To.V1006-Royalgamer06
The update that will update the full game v1005 to v1006. 

Killing.Floor.2.Ultimate.Launcher.V7-Royalgamer06
The Ultimate Launcher is a tool created by me. 
It has many essential and useful features, such as auto-cracking, a serverlist, hosting, joining and more.

Killing.Floor.2.Digital.Extras-Royalgamer06
Digital extras that were supplied with the Digital Deluxe Edition:
- Digital Artbook
- Soundtrack
- Wallpaper

Killing.Floor.2.SDK.Package-Royalgamer06
This allows you to make custom maps, etc. Launch it with these parameters: KFEditor.exe editor -useunpublished

____________
INSTRUCTIONS
1. Make sure WinRAR and 7zip is installed, or any other software that can extract this compression.
2. Remove any other version of Killing Floor 2, if installed.
3. Extract Killing.Floor.2.V1005.Cracked-Royalgamer06.7z to any folder.
4. Remove the "_Launcher" folder and KF2Launcher.exe.
5. Extract Killing.Floor.2.Update.V1005.To.V1006-Royalgamer06.rar to the folder containing the game V1005.
6. Install the redist inside the "_Commonredist" and "Binariesedist" folders.
7. Extract Killing.Floor.2.Ultimate.Launcher.V7-Royalgamer06.rar to the game folder.
8. (Optional) Extract Killing.Floor.2.Digital.Extras-Royalgamer06.rar to the game folder.
9. (Optional) Extract Killing.Floor.2.SDK.Package-Royalgamer06.rar to the game folder.
10.Go to your game folder and run KF2Launcher.exe (as administrator).
11.Start the game or host/join a server.
12.Play and have fun!
